name: JS Bin template
body:
Best features

  • no compatibility mode icon in IE8+
  • <html>'s conditional classes for IE8
  • css3-media-queries.js for IE8 (respond.js in not fully cross-domain)
  • mobile-first responsive web design ready
  • latest bullframe.css boilerplate by default (hosted on my google drive)
  • CDN CSS/JS readyness
  • modernizr.js
  • jQuery 1.X
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
